column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Right next to the Millennium park so this is a touristy place. Los Altos Benedict was the only descent food out of everything we ordered here. Coffee was terrible. If you are a Chicagoan
column2: you have so many better brunch options all over the city. Over Easy Cafe
column4: and Original Pancake House to name a few. However
column5: I understand that the restaurant is conveniently located right next to many tourist attractions in Chicago.
